name: test
description: Runs unit tests in a project.
longDescription:
Takes the name of the project, as specified in the `projects` section of the `angular.json` workspace configuration file.
When a project name is not supplied, it will execute for all projects.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project to build. Can be an application or a library.

options.name: configuration
options.description:
A named build target, as specified in the "configurations" section of angular.json.
Each named target is accompanied by a configuration of option defaults for that target.
Setting this explicitly overrides the "--prod" flag

options.name: prod
options.description:
Shorthand for "--configuration=production".
When true, sets the build configuration to the production target.
By default, the production target is set up in the workspace configuration such that all builds make use of bundling, limited tree-shaking, and also limited dead code elimination.

options.name: help
options.description: Shows a help message for this command in the console.

options.name: main
options.description: The name of the main entry-point file.

options.name: tsConfig
options.description: The name of the TypeScript configuration file.

options.name: karmaConfig
options.description: The name of the Karma configuration file.

options.name: polyfills
options.description: The name of the polyfills file.

options.name: environment
options.description: Defines the build environment.

options.name: include
options.description:
Globs of files to include, relative to workspace or project root. 
There are 2 special cases:
 - when a path to directory is provided, all spec files ending ".spec.@(ts|tsx)" will be included
 - when a path to a file is provided, and a matching spec file exists it will be included instead

options.name: sourceMap
options.description: Output sourcemaps.

options.name: progress
options.description: Log progress to the console while building.

options.name: watch
options.description: Run build when files change.

options.name: poll
options.description: Enable and define the file watching poll time period in milliseconds.

options.name: preserveSymlinks
options.description: Do not use the real path when resolving modules. If unset then will default to `true` if NodeJS option --preserve-symlinks is set.

options.name: browsers
options.description: Override which browsers tests are run against.

options.name: codeCoverage
options.description: Output a code coverage report.

options.name: codeCoverageExclude
options.description: Globs to exclude from code coverage.

options.name: reporters
options.description: Karma reporters to use. Directly passed to the karma runner.

options.name: webWorkerTsConfig
options.description: TypeScript configuration for Web Worker modules.
